description: AbstractObject is the abstract superclass of all feature and object types.

properties.name: id
properties.description: Specifies the internal database ID of the object.

properties.name: objectId
properties.description: Specifies the identifier of the object that is unique within the database. Using a globally unique identifier is recommended.

properties.name: identifier
properties.description: Specifies an optional identifier of the object that is globally unique.

properties.name: codeSpace
properties.description: Specifies the code space of the identifier, typically a reference to the maintaining authority.

properties.name: envelope
properties.description: Specifies the minimum bounding box that encloses the entire feature.

properties.name: objectClassId
properties.description: Specifies the internal object class ID of the object.

properties.name: lastModificationDate
properties.description: Indicates the date and time at which the object was last updated in the database.

properties.name: updatingPerson
properties.description: Specifies the person who last updated the object in the database.

properties.name: reasonForUpdate
properties.description: Specifies the reason for the last update of the object in the database.

properties.name: lineage
properties.description: Specifies the lineage information of the object.

properties.name: description
properties.description: Specifies a text description of the object.

properties.name: descriptionReference
properties.description: Specifies a remote text description of the object.

properties.name: name
properties.description: Specifies a label or identifier of the object, commonly a descriptive name.
